results.title: Pasireotide-induced hyperglycemia in Cushing's disease and Acromegaly: A clinical perspective and algorithms proposal.
results.text_hl: Moreover, pasireotide used in the treatment of @DISEASE_Pituitary_ACTH_Hypersecretion @DISEASE_MESH:D047748 @@@CD@@@ may lead to more frequent and difficult-to-treat @DISEASE_Congenital_Hereditary_and_Neonatal_Diseases_and_Abnormalities @DISEASE_MESH:D009358 @@@glycemic disorders@@@ than those observed in @<m>DISEASE_Acromegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000172 @@@acromegaly@@@. Based on the pathomechanism of @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, we suggest using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as the first-line therapy, followed by @GENE_GCG @GENE_2641 @@@glucagon-like peptide-1@@@ and/or @GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@sodium-glucose co-transporter-2@@@ inhibitor, and finally @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with pasireotide-induced @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Witek P, Bolanowski M, Krętowski A, Głowińska A. Pasireotide-induced hyperglycemia in Cushing's disease and Acromegaly: A clinical perspective and algorithms proposal. Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2024;15():1455465. PMID: 39735646
citations.BibTeX: @article{39735646, title={Pasireotide-induced hyperglycemia in Cushing's disease and Acromegaly: A clinical perspective and algorithms proposal.}, author={Witek P and Bolanowski M and Krętowski A and Głowińska A}, journal={Front Endocrinol (Lausanne)}, volume={15}, pages={1455465}}

results.title: The Emerging Role of Metformin in the Prevention and Treatment of Colorectal Cancer: A Game Changer for the Management of Colorectal Cancer.
results.text_hl: Interestingly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ decreases the incidence of @DISEASE_Colonic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D003108 @@@colonic adenoma@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Acromegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000172 @@@acromegaly@@@ and reduces the incidence of @DISEASE_Inflammatory_Bowel_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D015212 @@@inflammatory bowel disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Inflammatory_Bowel_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D015212 @@@IBD@@@) among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, which can indirectly lower the risk of @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@CRC@@@.

citations.NLM: Ala M. The Emerging Role of Metformin in the Prevention and Treatment of Colorectal Cancer: A Game Changer for the Management of Colorectal Cancer. Curr Diabetes Rev. 2022;18(8):e051121197762. PMID: 34749618
citations.BibTeX: @article{34749618, title={The Emerging Role of Metformin in the Prevention and Treatment of Colorectal Cancer: A Game Changer for the Management of Colorectal Cancer.}, author={Ala M}, journal={Curr Diabetes Rev}, volume={18}, number={8}, pages={e051121197762}}

results.title: Acromegaly presenting with low insulin-like growth factor-1 levels and diabetes: a case report
results.text_hl: Her serum @GENE_IGF1 @GENE_3479 @@@insulin-like growth factor-1@@@ level, measured after glycemic control was achieved with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@, was elevated, which is characteristic of @<m>DISEASE_Acromegaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000172 @@@acromegaly@@@.

citations.NLM: Wijayaratne DR, Arambewela MH, Dalugama C, Wijesundera D, Somasundaram N, Katulanda P. Acromegaly presenting with low insulin-like growth factor-1 levels and diabetes: a case report J Med Case Rep. 2015 Oct 30;9():241. PMID: 26514337
citations.BibTeX: @article{26514337, title={Acromegaly presenting with low insulin-like growth factor-1 levels and diabetes: a case report}, author={Wijayaratne DR and Arambewela MH and Dalugama C and Wijesundera D and Somasundaram N and Katulanda P}, journal={J Med Case Rep}, volume={9}, pages={241}}
